version_description: - Welcome Desygner's new look! We've reworked the editor to make picking and finding the right images, text and elements easier!
- Welcome Desygner's new look! We've reworked the editor to make picking and finding the right images, text and elements easier!

- Desygner is now available in 15 languages! This time we welcome Catalan, Czech, Dutch, Indonesian, Italian, Polish, Thai and Vietnamese users!
- Find what you want to create faster and easier with a redesigned Formats screen. Use search to quickly filter by formats or size
- Create, name and save your custom size presets

- Desygner is now available in 15 languages! This time we welcome Catalan, Czech, Dutch, Indonesian, Italian, Polish, Thai and Vietnamese users!
- Find what you want to create faster and easier with a redesigned Formats screen. Use search to quickly filter by formats or size
- Create, name and save your custom size presets

- Desygner is now available in 15 languages! This time we welcome Catalan, Czech, Dutch, Indonesian, Italian, Polish, Thai and Vietnamese users!
- Find what you want to create faster and easier with a redesigned Formats screen. Use search to quickly filter by formats or size
- Create, name and save your custom size presets

- Desygner is now available in 15 languages! This time we welcome Catalan, Czech, Dutch, Indonesian, Italian, Polish, Thai and Vietnamese users!
- Find what you want to create faster and easier with a redesigned Formats screen. Use search to quickly filter by formats or size
- Create, name and save your custom size presets
- Desygner is now available in 20 languages! We welcome Greek, Japanese, Korean, Malay and Turkish users.
- Desygner is now available in 20 languages! We welcome Greek, Japanese, Korean, Malay and Turkish users.

- Background patterns are back - find them in the image picker! 
- Create amazing Instagram stories with the new format under Social Posts
 - Bug fixes and stability improvements

- Background patterns are back - find them in the image picker! 
- Create amazing Instagram stories with the new format under Social Posts
 - Bug fixes and stability improvements

+ Resize your designs to other formats and quickly create everything you need
+ Think it looked better yesterday? Check out and restore to previous iterations of your designs
+ Organize your Brand Kit with Folders and Color Palettes
+ Try out our new dark app theme. Find it in settings!
+ Share designs or whole projects right from iMessage in a breeze with the new Desygner iMessage extension
+ More download options: Download a range of designs from a project as PDF, choose download quality for JPGs or remove the background and make it transparent with PNGs
+ A plethora of bug fixes and stability improvements

- iPhone X support
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

+ Resize your designs to other formats and quickly create everything you need
+ Think it looked better yesterday? Check out and restore to previous iterations of your designs
+ Organize your Brand Kit with Folders and Color Palettes
+ Try out our new dark app theme. Find it in settings!
+ Share designs or whole projects right from iMessage in a breeze with the new Desygner iMessage extension
+ More download options: Download a range of designs from a project as PDF, choose download quality for JPGs or remove the background and make it transparent with PNGs
+ A plethora of bug fixes and stability improvements

+ Manage your designs without leaving the editor using the new "Pages" tool. Long press and drag a design to reorder designs inside a project.
+ Lots of new fonts with 339 Latin script font families and newly added support for Arabic, Bengali, Chinese, Cyrillic, Devanagari, Greek, Gujarati, Gurmukhi, Hebrew, Japanese, Kannada, Khmer, Korean, Latin Ext, Malayalam, Myanmar, Oriya, Sinhala, Tamil, Telugu, Thai and Vietnamese.
+ We will be tailoring the app to suit your needs. Set up your account to unlock 10 premium templates and access the personalized Desygner experience.

+ Loads of new stickers and images.
+ Revamped color picker: Quickly get to colors used in your design, your Brand Kit, or to those recently used!
+ Share files to Desygner app from any app right into your library or designs.
+ Numerous bug fixes and performance improvements.

+ Desygner 3.0 is out and it's looking better than ever! Meet the revamped Create tab, updated Editor, iOS 13 improvements, such as native Dark Mode support and a bunch of bug fixes.
